song_name: Heart Skips A Beat ft Rizzle Kicks
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Heart Skips A Beat ft Rizzle Kicks is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
